title: Did a staff member at an abortion clinic tell the patient to "let go'of a child who survived the abortion?
subtitle: A six-year-old secret abortion facility video reappeared online in February 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: An employee of the Women ' s Health Center in Bronx, New York, told a life-supportive underground activist that she must dispose of a child born alive after the failure of an abortion.
